paper.title: A note on the limits of collusion-resistant watermarks

author.org: IBM Almaden Research Center, San Jose CA

paper.venue: Theory and Application of Cryptographic Techniques
paper.abstract: In one proposed use of digital watermarks, the owner of a document D sells slightly different documents, D1;D2;,... to each buyer; if a buyer posts his/her document Di to the web, the owner can identify the source of the leak. More general attacks are however possible in which k buyers create some composite document D*; the goal of the owner is to identify at least one of the :[68],"show, for a reasonable model of digital watermarks, fundamental limits on their efficacy against collusive attacks.
